website_summaries.verdict: This 3.5-millimeter option sports an attractive design and is packed with superior sound features, such as high-density shielding and top-rated components.
pros: Has a low-profile step-down design for easy connectivity
24-karat gold-plated connectors and high-density shielding offer improved sound over other cables
Cable lengths range from 6.6 to 33 feet
cons: This cable may not be flexible enough for some

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Many people don't realize when putting together a sound system that the cables are just as important as the speakers. I am so pleased with the sound I am getting from a moderately priced speaker through this cable. my husband, a sound "snob", said that it is annoyingly good sound, meaning that he was shocked and amazed that something so reasonably priced could produce such clear and full sound. obviously, the speaker deserves applause too but with an inferior cable it would not sound as stunning as it does.
customer_reviews.author: mommymouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Sounding Cable
customer_reviews.text: Actually sounds noticeably clearer than the old plastic fantastic cable it replaced. Feels and looks well made. Love the sapphire blue housings. So much prefer the PVC jackets used here over braided fabric jackets that are so prevelent these days. HIGHLY RECOMMEND Additionally: These cables are so worth the $$$ the old saying that you get what you pay for is true in this instance AND THEN SOME!!! A Great deal at twice this price.
customer_reviews.author: Alphaholik

customer_reviews.title: Erratic connection for Asus
customer_reviews.text: Like: high quality cabling, doesn’t seem like it will fray any time soon. Good length. Maybe getting a “Y connector for connecting 2 speakers will solve connectivity issues. Dislike: doesn’t pop/snap into my Asus laptop’s headphone jack fully. Thus, the sound inevitably cuts off, have to re-establish connection, alternatively have to hold plug steady until it loses connection again. This may or may not be the circumstance for you.
customer_reviews.author: brifd1

customer_reviews.title: simple accessory with quality builld
customer_reviews.text: clean simple and quality build. very impressed with the thickness of the cables and how each component seem snug fit, nothing loose. feels very sturdy and tough. would have liked to have some color options
customer_reviews.author: EiZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the audio cable to work with my rocker game chair as the cables that come with the chair are cheap. Millso cable works really well with no audio distortion. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Enrico

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cable for iPad to aux in on amp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cable for taking output from my iPad through the earphone jack and inputting signal into the aux in on my Kantana Amp. Great reliable cable with excellent audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Martini

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my 15 year old and cable finally gave out. It's very durable and conducts well. Let's see if it can beat 15 years, though. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Jung

customer_reviews.title: Good product and even greater seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got an item that wasn't up to par (must've been just a fluke) but the Seller is really committed to my satisfaction and sent me a new item that works great. I appreciate Sellers like MillSO, they work hard to provide great product and service. Thank you 😊 👍
customer_reviews.author: Coutch Potato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these i bought some cheaper..off ebay....you get what you pay...the others the sound was distorted only worked on one side and very cheaply made...i must say the quality...sound..fit..and even i noticed these are a more solid material...i used mine to connect my projector to my stereo..and soundbar and ran it through the ceiling so i needed something dependible....nailed it this time
customer_reviews.author: sin city raiders

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice gold and blue contrast good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and pretty thick. Probably better than some braided ones. I'm using us in a studio environment and it sounds amazing so I can imagine it being perfect for any other application!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can handle a beating
customer_reviews.text: It well built, works perfectly and it's long. Now anyone can be the DJ in the car.
customer_reviews.author: juaniglesias

customer_reviews.title: Cuts off music
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this aux for over a week and it cuts off after 3 songs UPDATE The company sent me a replacement cord and works fantastic! They even checked back to make sure it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa B.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted about a month before it started having connection problems. Yes
customer_reviews.author: Mark Colter

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality product. Once I connect it, it won’t be removed, so it should work well.
customer_reviews.author: James A ONeill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Using in the car, the sound is good,
customer_reviews.author: yue li

customer_reviews.title: Great cables
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had them long, but they work great. No looseness, static, hiss, or dropouts. Just would like them to be a little more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat build quality and performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: These have worked wonderfully between my Studio, Car Audio Aux and even on my Note 9.
customer_reviews.author: BassHead

customer_reviews.title: ... surprised when my Auxilary cable in quick and with good quality. Sometimes with Auxilary cables they are cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when my Auxilary cable in quick and with good quality. Sometimes with Auxilary cables they are cheap and flimsy, but not this one! I have replaced my cars previous cord with this one and it has been working wonderful; even the sound quality is an improvement compared to one I bought at Target. I would love to see this cord in a slightly smaller form factor because the cord is visible in my car and I have no where to hide/put it when not in use. I truly do recommend it to other people and I will be buying one for my Bose speaker at home- especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Darien

customer_reviews.title: These are some very sturdy well built cables and the fit my phone perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some very sturdy well built cables and the fit my phone perfectly even with my case on. The one I had before wouldn't fit properly because of my case but this one has a raise lip designed to fit phones with most cases on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality cable
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the build quality of this cable, have yet to test the quality of the sound Edit: after having used the cabel extensively without the cable having failed i can now confidently rate this product 5*s
customer_reviews.author: TJ Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I really like the follow-up email from Millso with tips. It really shows they care.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

product_meta.title: MillSO 3.5mm Audio Cable (6.6 Feet) Male to Male Stereo AUX Cable TRS Headphone Jack Auxiliary Cable for AUX Cord, Car, Home Stereos, Smartphone, Tablet, MP3 Player, Speaker, Headphone - Metal Blue
feature_bullets: [Wide-ranging Use] MillSO 3.5mm audio cable easily connect two 3.5mm stereo audio devices. Use as a headphone cable, aux speaker cord or aux cable for car... Eg: cell phone, tablet or MP3 player to a Home / Car stereo system, headphones, speaker, Hi-Fi stereo systems, auto radio or computer and features a low-profile design that this aux cable enables easy connectivity while your device remains in its case.

[Qualified 1/8 stereo male to male aux cord] 24K gold-plated connectors ensure high stability, high-speed lossless transmission; metal housing is a wear-resistant, anti-corrosion, and solid protection; tin-plated oxygen-free copper wiring for high fidelity, pure sound quality.

[Quadr-Layer Shielding] this 3.5 male to male aux cord perfectly combined tinned coppers, aluminum foil, soft and durable PVC covers, it's high-density shielding protection and effective isolation, offer a full and delicate tone, highly restored quality sound.

[Beveled step-down design] This headphone jack cable features a low-profile design that enables easy connectivity while your device remains in its case. [Unique color design] Sapphire blue Metal Housing: Wear-resistant; Anti-corrosion; Solid protection; 10000+ plug test; Plug and Play; Smooth and stable.

[Reliable Warranty] MillSO offers a 12-month Unconditional Warranty for all our products to guard against any quality trouble. Please feel free to contact our warm 24-hour customer support team via ❤️support@millso.com❤️if you need any help.
